hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Umar:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, 'Allah will not look at the person who drags his garment (behind him) out of conceit

chapter.ara-name: بَابُ قَوْلِ اللَّهِ تَعَالَى: {قُلْ مَنْ حَرَّمَ زِينَةَ اللَّهِ الَّتِي أَخْرَجَ لِعِبَادِهِ}
chapter.eng-name: "Say: Who has forbidden the adornment with clothes given by Allah which He has produced for His slaves?"
